author: Dion Rabouin
title: "History is now on fast forward": The coronavirus outbreak will forever change the world economy
description: Both the U.S. and global economies are set to be permanently altered by the coronavirus outbreak and the measures that have been taken in response to it, experts say. The state of play: "Fundamentally there are going to be huge changes in household consumptio…
content:
